metadata.title: CVE-2024-22860 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Integer overflow vulnerability in FFmpeg before n6.1, allows remoteattackers to execute arbitrary code via the jpegxl_anim_read_packetcomponent in the JPEG XL Animation decoder.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
